resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106310</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106310</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207026</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Library of Congress LIVE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibliothek des Kongresses PHASEN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bibliothèque du congrès DE PHASE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biblioteca do congress VIVA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Libreria del congresso IN TENSIONE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιβλιοθήκη του συνεδρίου ΖΩΝΤΑΝΗ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biblioteca del congreso VIVA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a series of free events and webcasts that combine the treasures from the Library's collections with music, dance and dialogue. Webcast archives include the invention, art, and science of Leonardo da Vinci; music and stories from Scandinavia; Celtic stories, songs, and traditions; and the alley communities of Washington, D.C.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Reihe freie Fälle und webcasts, die die 
Schätze von den Ansammlungen der Bibliothek mit Musik kombinieren, 
tanzen und dialogieren. Webcast Archive schließen die 
Erfindung, die kunst und die Wissenschaft von Leonardo da Vinci ein; 
Musik und Geschichten von Skandinavien; Keltische 
Geschichten, Liede und Traditionen; und die Gasse Gemeinschaften
von Washington, Gleichstrom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une série d'événements et de webcasts 
libres qui combinent les trésors des collections de la bibliothèque 
avec la musique, dansent et dialoguent. Les archives de Webcast 
incluent l'invention, l'art, et la science du da Vinci de Leonardo ; 
musique et histoires de Scandinavie ; Histoires, chansons,
et traditions celtiques ; et les communautés de ruelle de 
Washington, C.C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma série dos eventos e dos webcasts livres 
que combinam os tesouros das coleções da biblioteca com a música, 
dançam e dialogam. Os arquivos de Webcast incluem a invenção,
a arte, e a ciência do da Vinci de Leonardo; música e 
histórias de Escandinávia; Histórias, canções, e 
tradições celtic; e as comunidades de Washington, C.C. da 
aléia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una serie di eventi e di webcasts liberi che 
uniscono i tesori dalle collezioni delle biblioteche con musica, 
ballano e dialogano. Gli archivi di Webcast includono 
l'invenzione, l'arte e la scienza del da Vinci di Leonardo; 
musica e storia dalla Scandinavia; Storia, canzoni e 
tradizioni celtiche; e le Comunità di Washington, DC del 
vicolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια σειρά ελεύθερων γεγονότων και webcasts 
που συνδυάζουν τους θησαυρούς από τις συλλογές της βιβλιοθήκης με
τη μουσική, το χορό και το διαλογικό παράθυρο. Τα αρχεία 
Webcast περιλαμβάνουν την εφεύρεση, την τέχνη, και την επιστήμη
του Leonardo Da Vinci  μουσική και ιστορίες από 
Σκανδιναβία  Κελτικές ιστορίες, τραγούδια, και παραδόσεις  
και οι κοινότητες αλεών της Ουάσιγκτον, ΣΥΝΕΧΈΣ ΡΕΎΜΑ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una serie de acontecimientos y de webcasts 
libres que combinen los tesoros de las colecciones de la biblioteca 
con música, bailen y dialoguen. Los archivos de Webcast 
incluyen la invención, el arte, y la ciencia del da Vinci de 
Leonardo; música e historias de Escandinavia; Historias, 
canciones, y tradiciones célticas; y las comunidades de 
Washington, C.C. del callejón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207026</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106310</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/library-of-congress-live</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
